game.name: The Backrooms : Lost Guest
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Stereo Sound, HDR available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Backrooms : Lost Guest is a visually realistic, co-op survival horror exploration game developed with UE5, supporting 1 – 6 players. Evade terrifying creatures and deadly hazards while solving room-based puzzles to find your way out of the Backrooms. A chilling adventure awaits you…
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Backrooms : Lost Guest is a visually realistic, co-op survival horror exploration game developed with UE5, supporting 1 – 6 players. Evade terrifying creatures and deadly hazards while solving room-based puzzles to find your way out of the Backrooms. A chilling adventure awaits you…
